tool_description: Controls the imaging equipment to acquire medical images according to the specified protocol parameters and patient positioning.

equipment_id.description: Unique identifier for the imaging equipment

acquisition_mode.description: Mode of acquisition: single_shot, series, dynamic, real_time

error_messages: Equipment not ready: The imaging equipment is not ready for acquisition.
Invalid protocol ID: The specified protocol ID does not exist or is not compatible.
Patient positioning error: Patient is not properly positioned for the selected protocol.
Acquisition timeout: Image acquisition timed out or was interrupted.
Equipment malfunction: The imaging equipment has encountered an error during acquisition.
Protocol parameter error: One or more protocol parameters are out of valid range.
usage: Provide equipment_id, protocol_id, patient_id, and acquisition_mode to initiate image acquisition.

acquisition_successful.description: Whether the image acquisition was successful

image_series_id.description: Unique identifier for the acquired image series

total_acquisition_time_seconds.description: Total time taken for image acquisition in seconds
